#Created a tibble
```{r}
 table <- sample(c("male","female"), size = 28, replace = TRUE, prob=c(16/28,14/28))
table %>%
    mutate(category = rep(1:7, each = 4))
  
  
  specify(response = income)
    generate(reps = 1000, type = "bootstrap") %>%
    calculate(stat = "mean")
```
